name: eyewitness
description: Chatbot to allow people to receive news from providers and submit their own stories.

scripts.deploy-all-production: npm run deploy-demo-production && npm run deploy-battabox-production && npm run deploy-sabc-production && npm run deploy-thestar-production
scripts.deploy-demo-production: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-demo && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-demo
scripts.deploy-battabox-production: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-battabox && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-battabox
scripts.deploy-sabc-production: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-sabc && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-sabc
scripts.deploy-thestar-production: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-thestar && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-thestar
scripts.deploy-all-staging: npm run deploy-demo-staging && npm run deploy-battabox-staging && npm run deploy-sabc-staging && npm run deploy-thestar-staging
scripts.deploy-demo-staging: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-demo-staging && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-demo-staging
scripts.deploy-battabox-staging: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-battabox-stag && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-battabox-stag
scripts.deploy-sabc-staging: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-sabc-staging && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-sabc-staging
scripts.deploy-thestar-staging: heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-bot-thestar-staging && heroku container:push web -a eyewitness-rs-thestar-staging

author: Atchai <enquiries@atchai.com> (https://atchai.com)
